name: Puffer Fish's 200m Freestyle
description:
Puffer Fish's 200m Freestyle

Prototype Studio Week 7 - THE OLYMPICS

This is a game for 2-4 people. You are a competitors in the 200m freestyle competition. But all of you are puffer fish. You can inflate and deflate to swim faster, or even hit your opponent. Remember to touch the wall when you approach the opposite side.

How to play

  • Restart - R

Player Yellow

  • Move & Rotate - Controller 1 Left Joystick
  • Inflate - Controller 1 Left Trigger

Player Red

  • Move & Rotate - Controller 2 Left Joystick
  • Inflate - Controller 2 Left Trigger

Player Green

  • Move & Rotate - Controller 1 Right Joystick
  • Inflate - Controller 1 Right Trigger

Player Blue

  • Move & Rotate - Controller 2 Right Joystick
  • Inflate - Controller 2 Right Trigger
